effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.4 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 672,937.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cruel Gladiator's Satin Hood

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 927,918 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
